title: graduated 43 44 recently was on a honor flight to Washington DC.  All of my things were stollen from my trunk so I do not have any service ribbons etc.  Family has made me a scrap book about my honor flight how do I start to trace the metals ribbons etc I would have earned in europe?  I was with 3rd army as a 20th corps thanks for any help. Bill Heise
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=15749
